description: Try our easy to follow Poached Asian Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Poached Asian Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make chicken stock: Combine 1 whole organic free-range chicken, 3-4L water (to cover chicken), 2 roughly chopped carrots, 1 roughly chopped onion (no need to peel), 2 sticks celery (chopped), 1 tsp black peppercorns, 3 bay leaves, a few sprigs thyme in a large pot over medium heat. Bring to the boil and simmer for 2-3 hours. Skim foam from surface. Allow to cool. Reserve chicken. Strain stock and discard vegetables.

To make chicken stock: Combine 1 whole organic free-range chicken, 3-4L water (to cover chicken), 2 roughly chopped carrots, 1 roughly chopped onion (no need to peel), 2 sticks celery (chopped), 1 tsp black peppercorns, 3 bay leaves, a few sprigs thyme in a large pot over medium heat. Bring to the boil and simmer for 2-3 hours. Skim foam from surface. Allow to cool. Reserve chicken. Strain stock and discard vegetables.

To make chicken stock: Combine 1 whole organic free-range chicken, 3-4L water (to cover chicken), 2 roughly chopped carrots, 1 roughly chopped onion (no need to peel), 2 sticks celery (chopped), 1 tsp black peppercorns, 3 bay leaves, a few sprigs thyme in a large pot over medium heat. Bring to the boil and simmer for 2-3 hours. Skim foam from surface. Allow to cool. Reserve chicken. Strain stock and discard vegetables.
